title: Baby Carrier
description: black cotton; distinguishable by tiny doughnut-like embroidery mixed in with braid embroidery on entire body and border of baby carrier; this is sewn on in horizontal strips interspersed with strips of silk applique and/or striped printed cotton on border; blue, red, green and white on black; black lining; long raw edges from where straps have been removed are lapped over and sewn down
